problem.markdown:
GENDER AND COLOR OF PUPPIES

>>The table above shows the gender and color of 7 puppies. If a puppy selected at random from the group is brown, what is the probability it is a male? (Answer in decimal form to the nearest hundredth)<< = .25 [explanation] The number of what you want compared to the number of choices containing what you want.
problem.p: The table above shows the gender and color of 7 puppies. If a puppy selected at random from the group is brown, what is the probability it is a male? (Answer in decimal form to the nearest hundredth)
